page.title: 06Pupil Survey
page.content: ************ We made a survey of several classes in the 1st year at school and we found out the following: Most of the girls like pop music and most boys like mod. The most popular food is chips. Both boys and girls like to wear trousers. Most people have a pet dog or fish. Most people travel 1 mile to school. For a holiday most people go to Spain. The boys' favourite hobby is Bicycle Motor Cross and the girls like listening to music. The favourite subject is craft. The favourite sport is athletics. Most people have a Ford or Datsun car. The favourite animal is a dog. Most people live in a terraced house. The average number of people in a family is 4/5.
